thread.title: This hotel was NEW - CLEAN & VERY FRIENDLY
thread.title_full: This hotel was NEW - CLEAN & VERY FRIENDLY - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: NDRUSH
title: This hotel was NEW - CLEAN & VERY FRIENDLY
text:
We usually stay in big fancy hotels with posh lobby's etc but this time we scaled it back a bit just to spend money on actually doing things with the teenagers and wow am I glad we did. My wife found this hotel and she nailed it because everything about it was amazing.... ESPECIALLY JUAN who took care of us every time we walked through the door:-) THANK YOU JUAN... SEE YOU NEXT TIME!
Room Tip: Rooms are not huge but they are all you need and super nice See more room tips
